MetaTags.title: OEM Speaker Cabinet Manufacturing | MF Customs
MetaTags.desc: OEM speaker cabinet manufacturing for pro audio and home audio brands. Trusted by companies from across Europe and USA.

openGraph.title: MF Custom Speakers | Custom Speakers
openGraph.description: Custom speakers just for you! We specialize in creating speaker enclosures for audiophiles and sound lovers. We offer precise craftsmanship, modern design, and excellent acoustics thanks to the use of CNC machines and CAD projects. Our solutions combine technology with a passion for music, delivering a unique audio experience.

twitter.title: MF Custom Speakers | Sound on Your Terms
twitter.description: We create custom speakers for audiophiles and lovers of great sound. Precise craftsmanship, modern design, and top-quality audio. Discover how we can improve your sound system!

About.title: About us
About.description: We are enthusiasts of sound and aesthetics who combine their knowledge and experience to deliver audio solutions tailored to the individual needs of our clients. Skills acquired over the years allow us to combine technical knowledge with a unique approach to design.
About.goal: Our goal is to deliver custom enclosures that not only sound exceptional but also look like works of art, creating the perfect complement to your space. Our custom speakers are a guarantee of satisfaction.

customSpeakers.title: Custom Speakers
customSpeakers.description: We create unique audio systems tailored to your needs and preferences, whether it’s for a living room, office, or bedroom. We consider the target environment, your current amplifier, and your sound preferences.

crossoverDesign.title: Crossover Design
crossoverDesign.description: Our experience and knowledge allow us to build crossovers that match your sonic preferences. This is the heart of the system, shaping the character, tone, and overall perception of the sound produced by the speakers.

driverSelection.title: OEM Speakers Cabinets Production
driverSelection.description: We also manufacture OEM speaker enclosures for audio companies around the world. We have experience working with brands from countries such as Switzerland and the USA, ensuring top-tier build quality and on-time delivery.

cncServices.title: CNC Services
cncServices.description: Thanks to our CNC capabilities, we can handle even the most demanding projects, tailoring every detail to your expectations.

consultation.title: Consultation
consultation.description: First contact, where you describe your requirements.

projectAndQuote.title: Custom project and quote
projectAndQuote.description: After understanding the requirements, we create a 3D project for approval and a full quote.

payment.title: Payment
payment.description: 50% payment before production starts, 50% after receiving the finished system.

production.title: Production
production.description: After receiving the payment, we start the production process, which usually takes no longer than 2 weeks.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.description: Safe packaging and shipping of your system by courier or personal pickup at our company's headquarters, to which we cordially invite you!

passion.title: Passion
passion.content: Custom speakers – the idea was born from a passion for music and technology. MF Customs is the result of years of dedication to achieving natural and engaging sound, and the desire to deliver a sonic effect in an interesting and unconventional form.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to deliver custom speakers that fill your space with sound that is both true and full of emotion. Beyond the sound itself, there's also visual form – beautiful and unique speaker enclosures. Quality and attention to detail – that’s our motto.

components.title: Components
components.content: In our custom speakers, we use components from market leaders. The drivers come from manufacturers who ensure consistent and repeatable performance as well as the highest build quality. We carefully select models that reproduce music with the highest fidelity – and among them, those that still retain emotion and expression.

quality.title: Quality
quality.content: Our enclosures are entirely handcrafted by us, giving us full control over the production process. We use only the highest quality materials. Thanks to CNC machines, we ensure precision and repeatability in every cut. We always optimize the enclosures in terms of stiffness, standing waves, diffraction on sharp edges, damping, and speaker placement.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.subtitle: Have a question?
Contact.name: Name
Contact.travelText: Check our location on the map and use Google Maps to find the best route to our showroom and read reviews from our customers.

ContactForm.descrequired: The message must be at least 10 characters long
ContactForm.descmax: The message must be less than 300 characters

Cookie.title: We respect your privacy
Cookie.message: Our website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience. By continuing to use our site, you consent to their use. You can find more information in our Privacy Policy.
Cookie.settingsConent: Customize your cookie preferences. Some cookies are necessary for the website to function properly.

necessary.title: Necessary
necessary.description: Required for the proper functioning of the website.
